data.text:
We help the world run better

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

Summary & Role Information:

You will be responsible for key database deliverables and to drive escalations and act as a technical specialist in the area of performance and troubleshooting of SAP HANA or Sybase ASE. Your role will be a database senior specialist. You will be SPOC for strategic customer contact from technical standpoint for SAP HANA or Sybase ASE. You would need to collaborate closely with our problem management team, incident management team, war room, technical architecture team, service engineering and discuss about potential performance issues with Development and de-escalate the situation.

You will have the opportunity to get exposure on the largest databases and largest scale-out systems available among customers, systems on different Hyperscalers like Azure, AWS, GCP starting from 64GB to 24TB.

In addition to this , you will be working on innovation projects from the database perspective.

EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS:

B.E / B.Tech / M.Tech / MS / MCA fulltime

Experience (Role requirements)

Minimum 10+ years database expertise and at least 5+ years on SAP HANA or Sybase ASE.

Deep technical understanding in SAP HANA or Sybase ASE.

Experience in DB installation, upgrade, planning, and implementation.

Experience in troubleshooting and performing root cause analysis.

Strong technical knowledge in Backup and recovery strategies, System Copies, High Availability and disaster recovery scenarios, Replication knowledge is must.

Knowledge in performance troubleshooting and optimization.

Well organized, willing to learn and own the topics and share the knowledge with the team.

Willingness to take on-call duties and contribute to operations.

Understanding of different Hyperscalers would be an added advantage.

Ability to drive escalation to closure by engaging with different stakeholders

Must Have Skills:

Replication Concepts

Backup & Recovery, Performance troubleshooting, Service Architecture, Encryption

General incident, troubleshooting skills, team work and collaboration.

Linux Basic Knowledge.

Good to have skills:

SQL Programming skills

Power shell skills

Hyperscaler experience

MSSQL knowledge

Exposure to Agile Methodologies

Meet Your Team :

We are responsible for Global Database operations in ECS.Our team is spread across the globe Bangalore, Pune, Romania, Germany and Mexico. We are a highly diverse team with multifaceted expertise.

We manage close to 25K+ databases and growing, predominantly SAP HANA, followed by Sybase ASE, DB2, Sybase IQ, MSSQL.
